quantumPPMS 0.3.1
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Reference

    All functions

    VSMdata() VSMdata()

    VSM data class

    get.Mcorr()

    removes background susceptibility

    get.vsm.sweepData()

    OBSOLETE: Return only data of magnetic sweeps (hyst loop)

    getVSM.type()

    Categorize VSM measurement

    initialize(<VSMdata>)

    Constructor method of VSMdata Class

    plot(<VSMdata>)

    plot VSMdata object

    ppms.load.acms()

    Loads QD PPMS ACMS data from file

    ppms.quickLoad()

    Loads several Quantum Design PPMS files at once.

    ppms.seqType()

    OBSOLETE: Returns characteristics of a PPMS data file.

    ppms.vsm.hystLoops()

    OBSOLETE: Returns a vector that separates different hysteresis loops

    print(<VSMdata>)

    print VSMdata object

    summary(<VSMdata>)

    summary of VSMdata object

    vsm.analyzeLoop()

    Analyzes a single hysteresis loop

    vsm.data.frame()

    Convert VSMdata object to data.frame()

    vsm.get.Coercivity()

    returns coercive field of hysteresis loop

    vsm.get.HystLoops()

    extract hysteresis loops (OBSOLETE, use ppms.vsm.hystLoops)

    vsm.get.Msat()

    returns saturation magnetization of hysteresis loops

    vsm.getLoop()

    Subset of VSMdata object

    vsm.getSampleFiles()

    Sample PPMS sample data files

    vsm.getSusceptibility()

    Returns the susceptibility background (high H)

    vsm.guessTdep()

    Tries to find out the deposition temperature

    vsm.help()

    VSM Help

    vsm.hystStats()

    Statistics for all Loops in VSM object

    vsm.hystStatsLoop()

    Statistics for one Hysteresis Loop

    vsm.import()

    Import VSM data from file

    vsm.info()

    Reads VSM data file header

    vsm.validFile()

    VSM DAT file

    vsm.version()

    VSM DAT file

    Contents

    Developed by Thomas Gredig.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.1.
